men specifically have gotten when it

not young enough not super old either
but I was around when people were still
dying and safe sex was such an important

when I was growing up Pedro Zamora was
the only gay person I saw representing

so many levels I was gay he was gay I'm
Cuban he was Cuban and he was just being
himself and being on TV and so inspiring
I wish that I could have had someone
like me too when I was younger you know
I I would like to think that
despite the fact that I'm controversial
or maybe even because of it uh that I
Inspire young gay people because they

that's

um you know being Cuban is just another
part of who I

gay part of
town being gay in the Cuban Community
for me was not the easiest experience
that's one of the reasons why I left

could be myself and stay living in

Community um is still very much

there's a good number of people in
